column4: why would my penitum 3 machine have boot error but the AMD althon xp goes on with out a problem
mmmmmmmmmmm watching ubuntu install fun fun
if you burned the cd on the amd machine maybe the cdplayer in your p3 machine can't play the disc. some cdplayers are... umm.... not so good. can be the media.
I used to use a voodoo 3 a couple of years ago. it works fine. you should probably use the xserver-xorg-driver-tdfx or xserver-xorg-driver-voodoo. the libglide files is probably useful as well
